In England, in the seven days to 28 September, there were 192,258 new confirmed cases (340.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 September, there were 171,581 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 12% (20,677 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 October is 6,725,105 (11,892.3 cases per 100,000 population).
